title: Rokma
description: Flexible Communication Design Service for small companies.Imagine > Plan > Produce > Launch. Also just consulting!
description_web: Communication has never been cheaper and more accessible. A well thought internet presence reduce the small entrepreneur's stress. An advisor helps rationalize.
description_photography: Photography is Visual Communication roots. Today we need to hit strongly and deep into emotions. So you need carefully crafted ideas expressed in pictures!
description_advertising: Nothing that is new, can be accepted without being well proposed first.
description_branding: Your products must be recognisable, that's why you need branding, to build your product identity.
description_specials: Consulting with an OUT-OF-THE-BOX thinker is paramount for your ONE-SHOT PROJECT success. I will make sure your investment is worth or don't take the job.
